about_the_game:
The Deluxe Helping Hand Set offers a larger amount of heals and in-game currency to help Mai and her friends navigate through the mysterious town of Le Choara.

The Deluxe Helping Hand Set includes:
・Special Patch 1.0 x30
・Special Patch 2.0 x30
・Special Patch 3.0 x30
・Special AR Code Patch x30　　　

You have obtained the following amount of in-game currency Eni:
・60000000 Eni　　　

※You will have to progress the game until you can use recovery items.
※You will have to progress the game until you can use in-game currency.
detailed_description:
The Deluxe Helping Hand Set offers a larger amount of heals and in-game currency to help Mai and her friends navigate through the mysterious town of Le Choara.

The Deluxe Helping Hand Set includes:
・Special Patch 1.0 x30
・Special Patch 2.0 x30
・Special Patch 3.0 x30
・Special AR Code Patch x30　　　

You have obtained the following amount of in-game currency Eni:
・60000000 Eni　　　

※You will have to progress the game until you can use recovery items.
※You will have to progress the game until you can use in-game currency.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements

short_description: The Deluxe Helping Hand Set includes many consumable items and large some of in game money to help overcome your foes!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
